name: 38th World Conference on Applied Science, Engineering & Technology
content: The foremost aspiration of the 38th World Conference on Applied Science, Engineering & Technology, is to serve as a platform that facilitates the deliberation of the challenges involved in the practical implementation of all the most advanced knowledge produced in the fields of applied science, advanced engineering and technology. The organizers of this highly anticipated Manila event look forward to bringing all specialists, academics, practitioners, industry experts and students (from the fields of applied science, advanced engineering, and technology) from around the world together and expose the results of modern experimental research studies in these disciplines for their benefit.
